Metadata.Title: RHBA-2019:2921: OpenShift Container Platform 4.2 RPM Release Advisory (Important)
Metadata.Description:
Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform is Red Hat's cloud computing
Kubernetes application platform solution designed for on-premise or private
cloud deployments.

This advisory contains the RPM packages for Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform 4.2. See the following advisory for the container images for this release:

https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHBA-2019:2922

Space precludes documenting all of the bug fixes and enhancements in this
advisory, as well as all of the container images in this advisory. See the
following Release Notes documentation, which will be updated shortly for
this release, for details about these changes:

https://docs.openshift.com/container-platform/4.2/release_notes/ocp-4-2-release-notes.html

You may download the oc tool and use it to inspect release image metadata
as follows:

  $ oc adm release info quay.io/openshift-release-dev/ocp-release:4.2.0

The image digest is sha256:a2b56060f9d462ce879ce57d27f41941081ba063f4ac7f775505f0903d0713a

All OpenShift Container Platform 4.2 users are advised to upgrade to these
updated packages and images.

Criterions.Comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
jenkins-2-plugins is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
